name: Fillipe Lima
body:
Hi,

My name is Fillipe. I'm a passionate and curious software developer and have been working on web applications over 12 years.

From 2007 to 2008 I Lived 1 year in Toronto - Canada in order to study English. Love that language, by the way.

Even though most of the time I use Java, Iâ€™m willing to develop and delivery code in any language / framework needed. I think the good programmer can code in any language, it's just a matter of syntax that can be grasped quickly. What really matters is how the developer thinks and how he/she can approach problems, using his/her strong knowledment in Object Oriented Programming, Data Structures and Algorithms, for example.

I worked as a programmer, PL/SQL developer for Oracle DB, Software Architect, Data administrator, Change and Configuration Manager and Team Leader.

Used Core Java, Java EE, JSP, JSF, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, EJB, Struts, Hibernate, EclipseLink, UML.

Oracle DB, SQLServer, PostgreSQL

Weblogic, JBOSS, Tomcat

Eclipse, Jbuilder, Oracle Designer.

CVS, IBM Rational Clearcase, Borland StarTeam, GIT

Windows / Linux (Ubuntu)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
